title: Medigap FAQs: Answers to Your Questions on Plan F Closure
text:
At the end of this year, the Cadillac of Medicare-related insurance plans will close to Medicare newcomers. So people who turn 65 in the future won’t be able to enroll in Medicare supplement Plan F, the most popular and expensive Medigap insurance plan that retirees buy to cover costs Medicare doesn’t cover.

People already in Plan F will be allowed to stay, but insurance experts think they may be surprised in the future by high premiums. There is also speculation that costs could rise sharply for people in Plan G, which is...
description: Barron’s recently explored the closing of Medigap Plan F, the Medicare supplemental insurance plan, but readers had many more questions. Here, some answers.
